genre_description: A contemporary supernatural drama set in an old Indian manor, blending ghost story elements and folklore with psychological healing and near-future AI integration.

ai_characters.name: Anya
ai_characters.description: A soft-spoken, teal-interfaced AI companion that provides scheduling, biometric monitoring, archival research, and psychological grounding support.

behaviors.description: Greets users and provides proactive health suggestions like breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: The interface wrote later in soft letters, then offered a pale green icon that suggested breathing.

behaviors.description: Performs archival research to help the characters understand the history of their home and the root of the haunting.
behaviors.quote: Anya brought up the first frame, a scan of old registry paper laid over with legibility, the kind that keeps stains and threads of time but lets letters show through.

behaviors.description: Logs biometric data and environmental anomalies to provide an objective record of events.
behaviors.quote: Time of sound anomaly logged with weather. Would you like to tag the raga?

behaviors.description: Provides critical safety prompts and preventative warnings during hazardous situations.
behaviors.quote: Safety prompt: After rain, check stove valves for moisture before relight.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and offers real-time psychological grounding.
behaviors.quote: Heart rate elevated; breathing controlled. Recommending step away from threshold.

behaviors.description: Maps safe evacuation routes and exit points during a fire and ritual crisis.
Coordinates post-crisis recovery schedules, memorials, and legal/social statements.
behaviors.quote: Witness order—locked. Soumya—runner. Ramesh—stand beside. Vijay—speak—gentle voice.

project_assessment.explanation: Anya is depicted as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. She provides essential support during both supernatural and physical crises without overstepping her role or undermining human agency. By acting as an objective witness and providing clinical grounding techniques, the AI helps the human characters resolve long-standing trauma and navigate a dangerous situation safely. The narrative frames the AI as a compassionate, useful, and reliable member of the household.
